node.display_long_description:
TOP FITNESS APP OF 2020 — Oculus

Who said exercise needs to be full of pain and misery? Not us!

We believe it’s easy to get fit and stay motivated when you actually enjoy your workout!

FitXR is bursting with Box and Dance workouts that you’ll love. We’ve got a class for every mood, goal and fitness level — all guaranteed to leave you feeling sweaty and uplifted!

POWERED BY FUN
FitXR is packed full of workouts that you will love, not fear. Train alongside others and enjoy the power of group workouts!

ANYWHERE. ANYTIME
Work out whenever and wherever you want. FitXR turns any place into your own state-of-the-art fitness studio!

NEW CLASSES ADDED REGULARLY
World-class workouts by the world’s top trainers. Every class has been designed to increase energy levels, burn calories and improve strength.

METRICS THAT PUSH YOU
Easily track your performance in real-time. For extra motivation, the class leaderboard provides a little healthy competition.

node.display_short_description: These classes really pack a punch! Featuring full-body workouts that mix high-intensity cardio with muscle endurance. Great to get your heart rate up and challenge you!

purchase_alerts.message: 这是附加内容，需要有主游戏 (FitXR — Box and Dance Fitness) 才能玩

nodes.title: Absolute Box & Absolute Dance Packs — Out Jan 28!
nodes.body_text:
Launching Jan 28 are two workout packs for FitXR, each containing an hour of new workouts.

The Absolute Box Pack provides the perfect workouts to sweat out a busy day, get your heart rate pumping, and give a welcome endorphin boost.

The four new workouts really pack a punch and feature full-body workouts that mix high-intensity cardio with muscle endurance training.
 
Alternatively, turn up the music and get your blood flowing with the Absolute Dance Pack, featuring four new workouts for our recently launched Dance studio.

The classes take your body through a range of movements, working every muscle group and are a really fun way to improve your cardio fitness, coordination and lower body strength.

Both packs include an eclectic range of music to enjoy, varying from soundtracks of rock, hip hop, electro, and pop.

nodes.title: New Update: Introducing new Box environment and streak mode
nodes.body_text:
Today we're launching a new sky park-style boxing environment, amongst other new updates to FitXR.
 
When you next go to work up a sweat in a Box workout, you'll get to choose between a new Sky Park environment featuring an urban rooftop space with views of the city skyline, or the original FitXR studio environment.
 
We're also launching new features, including a new streak mode and the ability to adjust your glove alignment.
 
Training Mode vs. Power Mode
The streak system will involve choosing between Training Mode - where any successful cue punch count towards your streak, or Power Mode, where streaks can only be maintained with explosive punches.

Fits like a Glove
Our new glove adjustment feature gives you the ability to reposition your gloves to create improved calibration.
 
Improved Performance
Further updates include improved hit detection, a more accurate recording of statistics, and an enhanced class filter.

Happy exercising!

node.internet_connection_name: 下载内容需要连接网络

node.reviewDescription: I was super skeptical when purchasing this game as I was a USA Boxing Instructor and thought how gimmicky it could be.  The game is really good, but does lack some fluidity and rhythm.   Some of the sessions are near perfect, but a lot of them are very simple and easily put together with no thought to "on rhythm" hits.  Another way to put it is, the hits are not to the rhythm of most of the songs.  The producer should have played the games before approving them.  I am also a video editor and know how easy this is, but this design team missed the mark big time.  I still enjoy my "VRKouts" every morning and so grateful to have a product such as this in these times.  If you are looking to lose weight, grab this now....it does work.  One more thing...they could use WAY more heavy rock music!
